name: Born's Frozen Soul
flavorText: This armor is designed after that worn by the famed warrior Born, who was known to rush headlong into battle against superior numbers with no thought for his own safety.
flavorTextHtml: This armor is designed after that worn by the famed warrior Born, who was known to rush headlong into battle against superior numbers with no thought for his own safety.
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 +15% Life(3) Set:     
 Reduces cooldown of all skills by 10.0%.    
 +20% Experience. (2.0% at level 70)
